content:
SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration Class

In this Article

Configuration common to all security token handlers.

Syntax

Declaration

public class SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Constructors summary

SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration()

Initializes a new instance of the SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration class.

Fields summary

DefaultCertificateValidationMode

Specifies the default X.509 certificate validation mode.
DefaultCertificateValidator

Specifies the default X.509 certificate validator instance.
DefaultDetectReplayedTokens

Specifies a value that determines whether to detect replayed tokens; false, do not detect replayed tokens.
DefaultIssuerNameRegistry

Specifies the default issuer name registry instance; an instance of the configuration-based issuer name registry.
DefaultIssuerTokenResolver

Specifies the default issuer token resolver instance.
DefaultMaxClockSkew

Specifies the default maximum clock skew.
DefaultRevocationMode

Specifies the default X.509 certificate revocation mode.
DefaultSaveBootstrapContext

Specifies whether to save bootstrap tokens; false, bootstrap tokens are not saved.
DefaultTokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod

Specifies the default token replay cache expiration period.
DefaultTrustedStoreLocation

Specifies the default X.509 certificate trusted store location.

Properties summary

AudienceRestriction

Gets or sets the audience restriction.
Caches

Gets or sets the caches that are used for this configuration.
CertificateValidationMode

Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validation mode used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.
CertificateValidator

Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validator used by handlers to validate issuer certificates
DetectReplayedTokens

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether replayed tokens should be detected by handlers in this configuration.
IssuerNameRegistry

Gets or sets the issuer name registry for this configuration.
IssuerTokenResolver

Gets or sets the issuer token resolver for this configuration.
MaxClockSkew

Gets or sets the maximum clock skew for handlers using this configuration.
RevocationMode

Gets or sets the X.509 revocation mode for this configuration.
SaveBootstrapContext

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bootstrap context (token) is saved in the ClaimsIdentity and Sessions after token validation.
ServiceTokenResolver

Gets or sets the security token resolver to use to resolve service tokens.
TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod

Gets or sets the expiration period for items put in the token replay cache.
TrustedStoreLocation

Gets or sets the X.509 trusted store location used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.

Constructors

  • SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration()

    Initializes a new instance of the SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration class.

    public SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration ();

Fields

  • DefaultCertificateValidationMode

    Specifies the default X.509 certificate validation mode.

    public static readonly System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode DefaultCertificateValidationMode;
  • DefaultCertificateValidator

    Specifies the default X.509 certificate validator instance.

    public static readonly System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator DefaultCertificateValidator;
  • DefaultDetectReplayedTokens

    Specifies a value that determines whether to detect replayed tokens; false, do not detect replayed tokens.

    public static readonly bool DefaultDetectReplayedTokens;
  • DefaultIssuerNameRegistry

    Specifies the default issuer name registry instance; an instance of the configuration-based issuer name registry.

    public static readonly System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry DefaultIssuerNameRegistry;
  • DefaultIssuerTokenResolver

    Specifies the default issuer token resolver instance.

    public static readonly System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver DefaultIssuerTokenResolver;
  • DefaultMaxClockSkew

    Specifies the default maximum clock skew.

    public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultMaxClockSkew;
  • DefaultRevocationMode

    Specifies the default X.509 certificate revocation mode.

    public static readonly System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode DefaultRevocationMode;
  • DefaultSaveBootstrapContext

    Specifies whether to save bootstrap tokens; false, bootstrap tokens are not saved.

    public static readonly bool DefaultSaveBootstrapContext;
  • DefaultTokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod

    Specifies the default token replay cache expiration period.

    public static readonly TimeSpan DefaultTokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod;
  • DefaultTrustedStoreLocation

    Specifies the default X.509 certificate trusted store location.

    public static readonly System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation DefaultTrustedStoreLocation;

Properties

  • AudienceRestriction

    Gets or sets the audience restriction.

    public System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceRestriction AudienceRestriction { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • AudienceRestriction

      The audience restriction.

  • Caches

    Gets or sets the caches that are used for this configuration.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityModelCaches Caches { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IdentityModelCaches

      The caches.

  • CertificateValidationMode

    Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validation mode used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode CertificateValidationMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509CertificateValidationMode

      The certificate validation mode.

  • CertificateValidator

    Gets or sets the X.509 certificate validator used by handlers to validate issuer certificates

    public System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator CertificateValidator { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509CertificateValidator

      The certificate validator.

  • DetectReplayedTokens

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether replayed tokens should be detected by handlers in this configuration.

    public bool DetectReplayedTokens { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if replayed tokens should be detected; otherwise, false.

  • IssuerNameRegistry

    Gets or sets the issuer name registry for this configuration.

    public System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry IssuerNameRegistry { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IssuerNameRegistry

      The issuer name registry.

  • IssuerTokenResolver

    Gets or sets the issuer token resolver for this configuration.

    public System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver IssuerTokenResolver { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityTokenResolver

      The issuer token resolver.

  • MaxClockSkew

    Gets or sets the maximum clock skew for handlers using this configuration.

    public TimeSpan MaxClockSkew { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The maximum clock skew.

  • RevocationMode

    Gets or sets the X.509 revocation mode for this configuration.

    public System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode RevocationMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509RevocationMode

      The X.509 revocation mode.

  • SaveBootstrapContext

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bootstrap context (token) is saved in the ClaimsIdentity and Sessions after token validation.

    public bool SaveBootstrapContext { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to save the bootstrap token; otherwise, false.

  • ServiceTokenResolver

    Gets or sets the security token resolver to use to resolve service tokens.

    public System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver ServiceTokenResolver { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityTokenResolver

      The token resolver.

  • TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod

    Gets or sets the expiration period for items put in the token replay cache.

    public TimeSpan TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The expiration period.

  • TrustedStoreLocation

    Gets or sets the X.509 trusted store location used by handlers to validate issuer certificates.

    public System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation TrustedStoreLocation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • StoreLocation

      The trusted store location.
